website_summaries.verdict: A sheet set that fits up to a 16 inch mattress. A step above basic with more details.
pros: Thin material reduces bulk and wrinkles
Smooth, silky feel rivals much more expensive sets
cons: The hem on the pillows doesn't hold up to the same standard as the sheets

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a set of these sheets in July 2016. They were fantastic, soft, comfortable!! I decided to order a second set. To my disappointment, the set I have most recently received are not only same sheets, they are a different color and a completely different material. Even the hems are different. The sheets aren't soft and all they are is microfiber. Even the tags are different, the little one is the original. It's false advertising to hit "buy it again" if the company does not sell the same product. In each photo the one on the left was the original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee' Haar

customer_reviews.title: NOT COTTON!  100% Polyester.  Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing HC Collection Bed Sheets Set, HOTEL LUXURY Platinum Collection 1800 Series Bedding Set, Deep Pockets, Wrinkle & Fade Resistant, Hypoallergenic Sheet & Pillow Case Set (Queen, White) In bold right under the product title it says 'Amazon's Choice for cotton sheets'. These are NOT cotton. The tag says 100% polyester and wash in COLD water. Made in China. Seriously? You want me to wash white bed sheets in COLD water that you claim are cotton? I'm not happy especially since I don't have time to replace these before my guests arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Stair Climber

customer_reviews.title: ARE YOU KIDDING ME???
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets and it have writing in pen on a pillow case?!? I'll post pictures to prove it. This is THE WORST AMAZON PRIME ORDER IVE EVER HAD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: NOT EGYPTIAN COTTON. Not even sure it there is ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT EGYPTIAN COTTON. Not even sure it there is any cotton in it. Looked all over the packaging and they don't even mention what they're made of. Is this legal ? They use the word Egyptian in their description to mislead. Thin, cheap. Premium 1500 Collection has nothing to do with anything other than just a name they use. Posted a photo of the amount they would refund if I return them. $1.17
customer_reviews.author: Oak Leaf

customer_reviews.title: the FINEST polyester in all of Egypt
customer_reviews.text: the FINEST polyester in all of Egypt... These sheets are NOT Egyptian cotton, they're not even cotton. So if you're buying sheets for your girlfriend who is allergic to polyester, you're the guy who just wrapped her body in 100% polyester. I'm not disappointed, I'm downright angry, this is INTENTIONALLY deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: midwestinny

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 different sets of bedding. Both arrived and contained spots on the sheets and on the Hotel Luxury, the sewing of the pillow cases were sub standard.
customer_reviews.author: Polarisguy

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical, but very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to purchase sheets on amazon. But I thought for the price I would give them a try. They washed up nicely and fit my bed. I have a thicker than normal mattress so I have difficulty finding sheets that stay on the bed and are good quality but not outrageously priced. These are amazing! They are so soft and stay on the bed. I wish there were more color options. I have already ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No: Very cheap and paper thin
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Wow these are paper thin and feel like a plastic bag. Absolutely NOT luxury. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Smith IITop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: SHEETS/PILLOWCASE SET
customer_reviews.text: I just received 2 set of these yesterday and unfortunately did not look them over very well before washing them. As I was folding them, I realized every one of the pillowcases were already coming apart at the seams. I should not have to sew something that I have bought. I guess you get what you pay for. I did not try to return them because I had already washed them. UPDATE: WORST SHEETS EVER! After the second wash one of the sheets had multiple holes in it. They are extremely cheap sheets and not worth a penny. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Not ur normal sheets
customer_reviews.text: I like cool beds so this is weird coming fron me. Ok, these sheets are out of my normal standard so... they are warm to the touch of skin. That's not a bad thing. I like to be cool when I sleep but hate jumping into a cold bed. These sheet eliminates this aspect. That's a good thing. The fitted sheet will easily fit mattresses as thick as 12+". Thru the nights sleep they proved to be a remarkable find. I love them. And I'm not going back to thos 1200 tpi cotton sheets. I think anyway. Lets see how long they last. I'll try to do an update in a month or 2.
customer_reviews.author: DeputyDave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: (Hotel Luxury Bed Sheets Set- 1800 Series Platinum Collection-Deep Pocket,Wrinkle & Fade Resistant (King,Cream) These are very nice sheets, very happy with them. They fit our 13-14 inch mattress with ease! I know nothing about real expensive sheets but compared to other sheets ive paid $60 for, these so far are better.
customer_reviews.author: Slankky

customer_reviews.title: I was fooled by so many high ratings.
customer_reviews.text: Not the Hotel Collection you find in the store! The first thing I noticed was how thin the sheets are. The second concern is these not all cotton or cotton blend. These are 100% polyester. If you sleep hot then you don't want synthetic fibers! It makes sleeping more uncomfortable! I'm sending these back
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Magoo

customer_reviews.title: I suppose a lot of people will like them but they just weren't for me
customer_reviews.text: While these sheets might be durable enough given their weight I found them to be really really thin. So thin in fact I could see right through them. I was looking for some that were much heavier. I suppose a lot of people will like them but they just weren't for me. I spent more money on a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BUYERS BEWARE INDEED!!! Same thing happened to me. Bought these sheets..love them. I want 2 more sets so after reading customers reviews warning about customers not getting the same sheets, I made sure to “order the exact same sheets”. What I received was 2 sets of sheets that were different. The pillow cases were the giveaway. Definitely, not the same. The bottom sheet doesn’t even fit our queen size mattress. Now, I am having difficulty trying to return them. PLEASE BE AWARE...if it happened to someone else and now me, this must be a scam! Especially since returning the items is impossible. Shame on you Amazon, I really believed you would actively stop scams such as this.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that I'm too busy to continue on ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2-3 sets & found all in the same condition - The finishing detail on the binding & hems us horrific especially the hems at the bottom of the sheets. I would say they are probably 1/2" with a straight sewing machine type of threading....it looks really cheap. The good news is that I'm too busy to continue on the linen issue so I'll donate them as opposed to taking much time to return them. As I mentioned in a previous e-mail, I ordered them a month or so ago but have only opened them 4/13, today .... Gawd bless China - I should know better; so should you in selling their product here.........TERRI ARMITAGE, Marina Del Rey, California.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Armitage

customer_reviews.title: No Fit For 16 Inch Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for 16 or 18 inch deep pockets on the fitted sheet. By the description they should have been big enough to work with my mattress. These pockets are the same as most other fitted king size bed sheets. My Mattress is 16 inches and these are not deep enough to go under the mattress and stay under the mattress.. If you truly have a 16 inch mattress don't buy these sheets. You'll be tugging to get them to go under your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for us. Not a fan of microfiber material.
customer_reviews.text: These are quality sheets and their is nothing wrong with them however we promptly returned them after sleeping on them for one night. My wife and I did not like the texture and feeling of the sheets. It was like our bodies were like Velcro to the bottom fitted sheet. Too much friction with body movement and it wakes us up throughout the night which translates to a bad night of sleep. I’m not exactly sure what microfiber cloth is made from, but I’m pretty sure it has nothing to do with Cotton which is your better choice. Stick with cotton not artificial material.
customer_reviews.author: BHR

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets but have stain spots on them right out of package
customer_reviews.text: Edit review- after 2nd wash more oil spots started showing up!! What the heck is wrong with this fabric. Please listen to others complaints about the same issue and do NOT buy! I am returning them ASAP! Sheets are very soft with huge pockets for thick mattresses. I bought Grey size queen. Only issue I see so far is it had some spots on the sheets. Like little oil spots or discoloration in fabric. Others have also posted this same complaint. I had guests coming so I didn't have time to return them. Also at only $26 on sale I don't have the time or energy to return them. Just see others pics and you decide....
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne ferns

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many stuck at home during COVID-19, I've been doing a bit of changing up inside the house, and ordered these sheets to go with a new bedspread. I did wash them before use, just as a precaution against the "new" smell causing nasal congestion. They came out perfect, wrinkle-free. Then I got the nice surprise that they fit my bed better than my old sheets! I have a thick mattress, and sometimes it was difficult to get the fitted sheet down over the corners - these fit much better, and cover to the bottom of the mattress all the way around. I would definitely recommend these lovely sheets, which I slept on for the first time last night!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Teague

customer_reviews.title: Danjor sheets NOT HC collection
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware.... the sheets I received were in a package with a label as Danjor sheets, not HC Collection. These are 100% polyester and made in China. They are extremely HOT to sleep with. I couldn’t understand why the reviews were so good until I looked at buyer pictures. Some people receive HC sheets and some receive Danjor. This is bait and switch and I’m surprised Amazon allows it to go on.
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed... Not Worth The Time, Effort Or Money
customer_reviews.text: Worst sheets I've ever purchased (and I've purchased dozens). Did not fit my bed at all. Way too small. Material was unbelievably thin and was not as advertised at all. I'm not someone that expects $150 sheets for $25 (which I've read hundreds of people complain about silly things). If you don't like them or have an issue...return them. Yes you get what you pay for and I've been lucky that ot of the dozens of sheets and duvets I've purchased these are the only ones I've had an issue with. I strongly recommend Amazon's bedding, just not this particular set...
customer_reviews.author: Uptyt1

customer_reviews.title: Title & Discription were misleading, Incorrect based on Search Result.
customer_reviews.text: Okay here's the deal, I do love these sheets but, there was some deception in the advertising. "1800" in the title, as if it were a thread count. My main beef is that I have allergies to some textiles, I specifically narrowed my search to cotton only sheets and selected a set from that search result. The words "feels like Egyptian Cotton" and listed in the description, which I discovered after receiving the product. This product should be removed from that "Cotton" search result as the product is in fact 100% Polyester. If taking the time to narrow the search is meaningless, get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality you are dreaming of
customer_reviews.text: Delivery: I received the Bed Sheets the next day I placed the order. so fast! Quality: It is really perfect and soft, a quality that you usually would feel when you are in a 4-5 star hotels. It is wrinkle resistant. After washing it and taking it out of the dryer it was not wrinkled, flattens completely when you fold it. Price: I say it is really affordable considering you are buying a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Les Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Never been more disappointed in an Amazon product
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled by the five star review. Terrible quality. I don’t know who or how anyone could consider these sheets luxury sheets. It’s an insult to anyone who owns a decent set of sheets. 1. Extremely thin. 2. Feels like polyester and cotton with a plastic blend. 3. Edges are poorly stitched. I’m so disappointed. I’m glad I only order one set of anything before I place a large order. Do not for any reason whatsoever order these sheets. *It’s partly my fault because the price didn’t match luxury sheets pricing. BUT their description said luxury. I should have asked for the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: its not the best ... Hotel Quality? What kind of Hotel?
customer_reviews.text: I am using this just for temporary use. I work away from home and I needed bedding. Its thin... not very good quality... its like sheets you buy from wallmart... I am just going to use it for a few months then donate it
customer_reviews.author: Allysia J. Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Not everything made in the USA is quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with oil stains. Received an email from the owner asking about the product. I responded telling her about the oil on 2 sets I ordered (and needed right away). She never responded. I have waited on at least an explaination or something stating she looked into the matter but nothing followed. I don’t like giving bad reviews but the quality is poor. I treated the this set before I washed them - the oil did not come out. I washed them 3 times they started fraying - still the oil or whatever it is is still there. They have been cut into garage rags.
customer_reviews.author: Misty S.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible , the fitted sheet is fine but the top flat sheet is not wide enough to tuck in on side WHY WOULD I ORDER DEEP POCKET SHEETS FOR MY TOP SHEET TO NOT TUCK ALL THE WAY AROUND !!! DONT BUY THESE IF YOU ACTUALLY WANT TO MAKE YOUR BED IT BOGGLES MY MIND WHY THEY WOULD NOT BE BIG ENOUGH HENSE "DEEP POCKET "!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey guthery

customer_reviews.title: Tissue Paper thin - get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: If you spend $29 for a set of Navy blue King sheets I guess you should not expect much. First they smelled like a latex balloon when I opened them. After a washing they did not shrink but the odor was still slightly there. I liked that they matched the quilt set I bought but they are very thin (you can see through them when held up). I hope they hold up to weekly washing. When it says they are LUXURY hotel bed sheet set you think your getting something that will hold up. NOT these sheets. If you want thin cool sheets these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: TwoOfAKind

customer_reviews.title: NOT great :(
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad and disappointed about these sheets. I had previously bought something very very similar and loved them, and expected the same here. A- they feel very cheap, they’re so thin I can see my hand through them!! B- they do not stay tucked over the corners of my bed ... SO annoying!! I’m way too lazy to return them, so I’ll just put up with them, but I won’t be happy about it. Edit: I downgraded it to one star. I threw them away because they were the literal worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazmom

customer_reviews.title: Sloppily made
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this set is the pillowcases. One side of each case is nicely hemmed and looks good. The other side is turned under at the edge but instead of being hemmed, it is just left hanging. It's not like the unhemmed part lays nicely inside the case. It doesn't. It hangs out and looks terrible. I don't understand why they couldn't just hem the last side. If you want nice bedding, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Night Reader

customer_reviews.title: It felt like my pjs were vecroed to the sheets all night
customer_reviews.text: Order 2 sets thinking they were 100% cotton since that's what I searched. They are not cotton. I sent the unopened package back immediately the morning after sleeping with the other set. It felt like my pjs were vecroed to the sheets all night. Now the open set sits in the closet collecting dust. Used on the guest bed once and the nights said they felt pinned down and twisted up in the sheets all night.
customer_reviews.author: Paleo4All

customer_reviews.title: No no NO! Seriously, NO
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate these so called1500 thread count sheets as a ZERO! I don't know who the heck is giving these sheet sets high marks, but every single person should be ashamed of themselves! These SHEETS ARE VERY POOR QUALITY AND SUPER THIN! THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISING AND AMAZON NEEDS TO PULL THIS SELLER FROM ITS ROSTER FOR SELLING SUCH A MISLEADING PRODUCT AND RIPPING OFF ITS CUSTOMERS!
customer_reviews.author: RT(R)

customer_reviews.title: Cream like cool light taupe. Good for frequent bedding change.
customer_reviews.text: HC Platinum 1800 Collection - Cream COLOR: Cream - Looks more like light taupe with a cooler tone (Originally ordered Camel but returned since it looked more like dark gold, brighter than expected) FIBER: 100% Polyester - Thin and smooth, relatively fast wash and dry QUALITY: Moderate - Simple seam and hem stitching, pillow case opening has a short fold inside that keep the pillow hidden and intact RECOMMEND: Yes - Good for more frequent change of bedding (Especially with a husband who sweats profusely even in winter, but then again we live in Southern California)
customer_reviews.author: rdlztkn

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable sheets
customer_reviews.text: ever since I bought these sheets, I've never felt the need to buy anything else. They are super comfortable and I've washed this about a thousand times and it still maintains its vibrant color. I would highly recommend these sheets although they do winkle a bit, nothing major though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sewing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I always wash new clothing, sheets, blankets, etc...before using. It's a rule. I ordered two sets. When I opened the royal blue set to wash, I loved the brilliant color however, after washing, although the color did not fade, the sewing quality sure did. Along with fuzz balls, which didn't bother me too much, was the threads coming loose from the fitted sheet and that is totally unacceptable. I also did not care for the thinness or texture of the material. Microfiber is definitely not for me nor is crappy seamstress skills.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: Broken elastic!
customer_reviews.text: I understand that you get what you pay for but I have received far better sheets for this price from other brands. As I was trying to put the sheet on the elastic which was thin, flimsy and not even sewn into the sheet fabric (but rather just inserted within) snapped and the entire fitted sheet was no longer a fitted sheet. A complete waste of money. Now I must go through the hassle of returning a broken product that broke before I could even use it to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: BEST sheets ever......proof is in how many have requested them as gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself initially and then liked them so well, I bought a set for our spare bed. My mom stayed with us while visiting and she fell in love with them as well, so I bought her some for her birthday. The love continues as I now have bought some for my sister and her husband for Christmas and now for their son who has gone off to college. Once you sleep on them, you will understand why. They are soft, cozy and do not wrinkle. Anytime I ask loved ones what they want for their birthday, it’s a common answer from most.....THOSE AMAZING SHEETS!!!!! You seriously won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not like these at all
customer_reviews.text: No hotel I have ever stayed would have such low quality sheets. I do not like these at all. The fitted sheet is really big (I have a deep pocket mattress), it bunches up in the night and feels like there is something in bed with you. The stitching gathers rather than having smooth seams. The only accuracy is that they are in fact white.
customer_reviews.author: H M

customer_reviews.title: Spend More $$ to get Quality Sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the FIRST "Amazon's Choice" product that I've purchased that was poor quality. (I used amazon's choice for: Belts, Pants, papertowels - pretty much everything) - These were thin, literally came with a hole in one of the pillow covers, and another of the pillow covers was sewn so poorly it was nearly impossible to get the "open end" seams to lay flat. For $29 - maybe this is a deal - we are used to $100+ sheets, and these are NOT even close to the quality of sheets in the hotels I sleep in: Hilton Garden, Holiday Inn Express, Hampton Inn, Marriott Courtyards - so no - these are not Hotel Luxury Bed sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Davis

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. I washed them and put them on the bed. First of all the color is really pretty! Ice blue I think. Also extremely soft! I have 2 silk pillow cases and these sheets feel soft like them. I did not like that a tag was attached to the upper side of the sheet. That should be on the bottom. So I flipped the sheet putting the wider hem at the bottom. The pockets are very deep! I can’t speak to their durability as I just got them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen U

customer_reviews.title: I will not be bying these again
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these sheets. The color is slightly different. That is not a big deal to me but a little annoying. One pillow case seam tore within a few months. We have had the two sets a year now and I want new sheets. There is piling which feels like dirty or sand on my legs. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Meushaw

customer_reviews.title: 100% Thin Polyester
customer_reviews.text: 100% super thin polyester sheets. "Top Quality", "Platinum Collection", "Hotel Luxury" - come on, really? In what hotel? The Hotel California? The Bates Hotel? My toilet paper is thicker than these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not hotel collection. Label clearly says microfiber. The 1800 can easily be misread for a thread count. Beware queen size does not have deep enough pockets. Really a full size set. You get what you pay for. I'm glad this was a lightening deal. I'm actually afraid to wash and dry for fear of shrinkage. Ok for a cheap set.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: POLYESTER NIGHTMARE
customer_reviews.text: Searched for cotton sheets and these were the first hit. I bought them, but should have read through more carefully, when it says like Egyptian Cotton it means 100% polyester. Polyester is NOT breathable. I wanted a light cotton sheet for summer and got a polyester nightmare instead. Save yourself the trouble and DO NOT BUY THESE SHEETS.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: I would've returned but they're pretty much the only ones I have at this time
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes in these sheets, util the first night. They do not stay on the bed. The elastic is very weak, basically worthless. The fabric, although very soft, is also very strange. Other fabric adheres to it. I.e. your pajamas. So when you roll over at night or move, your body movies, your pajamas stay put, thus you end up being all tangled up. Very uncomfortable. I would've returned but they're pretty much the only ones I have at this time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for summer!
customer_reviews.text: We live down south on the gulf of mexico and it’s hot in the summer keep the air con on at about 80 and I’m pleased to say that these sheets are great to sleep on and in ,,cool and comfortable....Our bed has a 18 inch deep mattress and the pockets fit just fine . The material is soft . Mind you we have sheets that are 500 to 700 thread count but they are to warm in the summer thought We’d give this a try and are happy we did.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin  magician

customer_reviews.title: Something New To Me
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a need for twin sheets for a hospital bed and decided to try this product rather than checking thread count. Just got them within the last 3 days so I can tell you they are soft and wrinkle free. I really enjoy the feel of this product. Regarding the stain resistance I am not in a position to answer that as I've not had the product long enough to acquire any stains. I truly enjoy the feel and look of this product and based on my minimum use I would highly recommend them. My neighbor saw them and is considering ordering some as well. Great product, good price, and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So I am very impressed with my new sheets. They are soft and do not wrinkle and have deep pockets that stay on the bed perfectly. I ordered them in white and I love them and will be purchasing more sets. I also get very hot at night but these sheets kept me a very good temperature without being too hot or too cold. For the great price and customer service and great sheets I highly recommend Update 10/16/2020 I have ordered a second set and they are just as great as the first set. I will definitely be getting my sheets on here with this brand from now on and will give them as gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: It was a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets because of the 'positive' reviews. It was a total waste of money! I washed them before putting them on my bed, and that's when I saw how cheap and thin they were, very low quality! The corners are sewn so cheaply as well. But, I kept them on and tried to sleep in them. The material HOLDS in heat, I was so hot I had to change back to my original better quality sheets which time has come, and instantly so much better. Bummed I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Girlsnstilettos

customer_reviews.title: they do not clean well at all (stains easily and the stains do not wash out)
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very difficult to put on the bed (I have to literally push against the mattress with my foot and pull the sheets with my hands to wrap them around the mattress). Also, they do not clean well at all (stains easily and the stains do not wash out). They feel starchy without having put starch on them. The set I received seem to be very low quality, which makes sense because of the pricing. Just be aware that you're getting your money's worth here and not a single penny more.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Bad QA and Manufacture defect
customer_reviews.text: The feel was good, after I put it on, noticed manufacturing defect on pillow case and loose sheet ( both had threads (strings) missing, looked like torn) so I would say quality assurance error. I haven't used it as far as using review, but this is for manufacturing and QA rating ONE STAR. Because I had to put it on and take it out :( Photos included. I hate to leave bad reviews :-/
customer_reviews.author: iGagJan

customer_reviews.title: I should have know better based off the price
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap sheets no matter how they are described in the ad. I should have know better based off the price. They are thin soft but VERY thin. Fit on the king size set was fine. You only get ONE PILLOWCASE! Save your cash, and spend it on a decent set of sheets, not these. I would have returned them but my daughter had already washed them and threw away the package
customer_reviews.author: haley onwiler

customer_reviews.title: Soft but wearing wrong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in December. They are for a guest room and only get washed and dried monthly. I am noticing that the bottom sheet is starting to "pill" very heavily. I wash in cold water and dry on low but it still is not holding up. Very disappointing as the softness is incredible and guests compliment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfortable, great for the price,,,
customer_reviews.text: The Hotel Luxury Bed Sheets are exactly as advertised. They are very soft and comfortable, clean easily without any extra additives or cleaners, and the deep pocket corners are excellent for holding the sheet in one place and don't allow the sheet to move at all, no matter how much you toss and turn or slide around on the bed. The price is the most remarkable thing about these sheets. I have paid a lot more for sheets that did not hold their place, ripped easily, came out of the washer and dryer with so many wrinkles that an iron couldn't get rid of them. This 1800 series Platinum Collection is great, and the price is greater...
customer_reviews.author: hill1000

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I got to sleep on these sheets for the first time last night and I didn't want to get out of bed. They are soft and fit the bed well. The color was nice (I chose the dark purple) and they are made well. As far as being cool goes, I would say they are average. I live in a very warm climate and they didn't make me sweat, so that's good enough for me. I am so happy I paid such a great price for such great sheets. I am about to buy a set for my kiddos too. Will definitely go with this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Brentt's Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and comfortable. I used these during the summer and they don't get too hot. They've already survived several washes, and are easy to clean. The pillowcases and sheets fit true to size. I always had issues with the fitted sheet getting wrinkled or sliding around. I didn't have any issues with that. I did notice that some people were having issues with durability, but I haven't had any so far. Will be back to edit if anything changes. The fabric is a little bit on the thin side. Honestly, this was one of the most reasonably priced sheet sets out there, so I was pleasantly surprised when I received these. I hope these last!
customer_reviews.author: cstar

customer_reviews.title: No pilling, no wrinkles, soft and crisp, lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets over a year ago-not a wrinkle to this day! They haven't faded, they haven't pilled, they are the BEST sheets I have ever spent my hard earned money on. And to top it off, after this long year of wear and tear, the corner ripped on the fitted sheet, enough to stick 2 fingers through, so I remembered the lifetime warranty....THEY deliver. I emailed them, they asked which sheet was damaged and replaced the ENTIRE set, for free. I assumed I would get a replacement fitted sheet and that was all I asked for in my email. Buy these sheets, buy 2 sets- you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they held up fine. Now as far as fit goes
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest sheets! The material is a bit thin, but the softness and fit make up for that. I've only washed them once, but they held up fine. Now as far as fit goes, the fitted sheet does not stay in place. The elastic is crappy and doesn't hold the sheet in place. If I hadn't already washed them and used them, I would return them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered beige twin set. I always wash things I purchase before using. This set arrived yesterday, and I washed them as is cold water, short delicate cycle, dried on lowest heat and removed before totally dry. Diagnoses: 1) Wrinkle resistant - NOT (see photo). 2) Half of the hem on pillow not sewn (see photo). 3) Softness - VERY soft, in fact so soft it's almost slippery, even clingy. 4) Bottom fitted sheet - too bit (see photo). The only thing good I can say about these sheets is that the color is as shown. I recommend PASSING on these sheets. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pence

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s sad to say but this particular sheet set did not hold up. The elastic on the fitted sheet is completely gone. I’ve had them about 4 years and change my sheets weekly. On average good sheets should last 6 to 8 years, however I have sheets from when we were first married (almost 16 years!) and have no issues with them. I’ve never had this issue with any of my other brands of sheets. What was even more disappointing was their customer service who explained it was my wear and usage of them. I will stick with my other brands, although slightly more expensive. I guess the saying is true, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Manfre

customer_reviews.title: they are super soft and fit great out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a case of you get what you pay for. In that regard, they are super soft and fit great out of the bag. The reason for a 4 instead of a 5, is the overall quality. This is our third set overall. After a handful of washes they start to tear or wear on the seams. However, we know what we're getting into at this price point. But again, we do find them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but durable
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to discover that these microfiber sheets were 100% polyester. They are somewhat soft, but the material is very thin and it's not as soft as some of the bamboo or cotton sheets I've purchased. I won't be buying them again. UPDATE: These have held up surprisingly well. I'm still disappointed that the material was so thin, but I prefer a heavier sheet, so that's on me. Upgrading from 2 to 4 stars because they really have held up well. I do wish the queen flat came a few inches wider, but that's just how manufacturers are.
customer_reviews.author: Sage W.

customer_reviews.title: These Sheets are Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets in hopes that they would be super soft and cool. They are smooth and soft but I have sheets that are better, My main disappointment comes from the fact that they hot to sleep on. These will be fine on the guest bed. I bought another sheet set from a different company advertising cooling sheets and boy are they!! What a difference! I guess it all comes down the materials used. All I want at the the end of the day are sheets that cool, soft and comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Spudder

customer_reviews.title: SOFT, LUXURY, VIBRANT COLOR  VERY HAPPY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! So soft and easy to wash. Purchased the purple (eggplant) color....Looks VERY rich on the bed. Waited a while to post a review as I was slightly skeptical of washing....these are GREAT! Color has NOT faded and No pilling. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Love these polyester sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been really surprised when I read the reviews about how people were in dislike of the sheets. The fact that they are not Cotton doesn’t bother me one bit. They both come from China, the sheets, but the cotton is bad right now, it’s infected with stuff. Inspect new Cotton items once you receive them, you’ll be shocked at what you can see. These are polyester which I love, the softness is incredible, I cannot wait to get in the sheets. Biting a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Stwy2Heavn

customer_reviews.title: It felt like 200  cotton
customer_reviews.text: It’s not 1800 not even near it. It’s so thin that I saw my hand through the white sheet. Didn’t wanted to spend too much money for the guest room sheets as we change then quite often, but I couldn’t let my guest sleep on this. extremely thin and cheap. I think people with very high reviews haven’t slept in actual 1800 cotton sheets. My current sheets for my bedroom are 1000 thr. Egyptian cotton and it’s at least 3 times thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Gray = dark olive/gray mix
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are comfortable and fit a deep mattress. However, the color when I pulled it out of the package immediately struck me as having a greenish tint to it, even though I ordered the gray. I asked a couple different people and they both thought there was a greenish hue to it. Compared to other gray and green items I have, it's across between dark gray and dark olive green. I'm keeping them because I needed them right away since I had just bought a new mattress and needed sheets of this size (full), but otherwise I might have exchanged them for a different color. The quality isn't bad though.
customer_reviews.author: andrea rodden

customer_reviews.title: Customer service awful. Cheap sheets
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is awful. I requested refund . The sheets were beautiful and soft. I measured my mattress before ordering do I was confident that size was correct. After washing it bc I wash anything first before placing on bedding it fit but when sleeping it keeps popping off. Duno if mine was defected but I did return it. I dropped off return UPS 3 weeks ago. Seller confirmed. I gave seller UPS return number last week. As of date SELLER NEVER GAVE ME A REFUND. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: fitted sheet goes in garbage. Plz be aware of this before purchasing - ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I had high hopes because of the other reviews on Amazon, however, this was not the cased when I rec'd this sheet set. It was thin, nearly see thru; only the pillowcases had the embroidered stitching, not the flat sheet. The fitted sheet was really why I'm returning this set - it had a rubberband in the hem, not sewn in wide elastic trim to actually hold the fitted sheet. So if that snaps, fitted sheet goes in garbage. Plz be aware of this before purchasing - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to write bad reviews, but these sheets are awful. I thought these were the same I had bought last time, definitely wrong. They feel Horrible to the touch, very cheaply made and see through when I put them on the bed. I would not recommend these sheets to anyone. I packaged them up right away and went straight to the return button. Plus, I'm being charged five dollars and some change to ship them back for a refund. DO NOT BUY THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Think I died and went to heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these sheets! Visited a friend in Maui and she had these sheets on all the beds, I don't think I have ever had a softer sheet! I suffer from Nurophy in my arms so really have to watch the sheets I sleep on, These are GREAT!! I actually ordered 2 sets for home and 1 for my daughter before I even came home so I would have these wonderful sheets to sleep on at home. THANK You!!!
customer_reviews.author: pattiwho

customer_reviews.title: Affordably Luxurious AND Practical
customer_reviews.text: I've previously purchased these sheet sets both for myself and as a gift for a friend who has everything. This time I bought them for my grandsons' new twin beds. The array of colors allowed me to ideally match each bedroom color scheme. The fit has been consistently perfect even on extra deep mattresses - the fitted sheets are easy to put on the beds and they stay in place because they're ample in size. I love the softness of the fabric and even my 10 and 12 year old grandsons noticed and commented. My own sheets are now several years old and are wearing well. And, "last but not least," the price is unbeatable! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: anita joy delight

customer_reviews.title: Newest set of sheets have flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought some these sheets months ago and love them. Bought this 2nd pair and they are poor quality. Unfortunately I am 4 days pass the return date. I washed them today before putting them on the bed and started to put them on. On the one corner the stitching is tearing apart and there is about a 5 inch gap. The stitching on the elastic band is ripped. I with they were like the 1st pair, but they are not. I may buy them again and take them right out of the package and look. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bison56

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended, Poor Quality, Not Soft
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Purchase. I do not understand all the positive reviews. I already had the Shane by Andover Mills microfiber sheets and they were wonderfully soft yet sturdy. I purchased these and was so disappointed. They were not very soft, hot and withing 3 washings the threads were coming loose. Also, stained really easily and no amount of treatment can remove the stains. I guess if you never owned a GREAT set of Microfiber sheets maybe you think this is a good deal. But I paid no more for sheets I listed above from Wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but affordable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I didn’t know what to expect from $25 sheets so that was probably my bad call for trying to save a few bucks. These sheets are very thin and the white ones I ordered almost see-through so if you are going for that hotel look I would not recommend. They are soft, but still wrinkle a lot and don’t fit the bottom neatly. I will keep them only because I already washed them but would have returned if I had examined earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulosa

customer_reviews.title: Just received these - wonderfully soft
customer_reviews.text: I just received these. They were big enough to fit on my queen bed where I have 2 foam toppers. These are very soft and softer and much less expensive than the last sheets I bought somewhere else. Since I just got these, I can't speak to how well they last. I will return in a few months to address that. So far, I am very happy with the quality of these sheets. If they wear well, I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very soft.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet set fit perfectly for my queen sized mattress. I usually have a problem where sheets don't fit because I have the pillow top but these are perfect. It is also soooo soft. I adore making my bed with these and then laying down. I most definitely will buy again. I dont eat in bed so im not sure about the stain resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Bri.K

customer_reviews.title: nothing "luxury" about these sheets
customer_reviews.text: first of all: the color is NOT sage but "kaki" the color of the army stuff. not subtle at all. Not wrinkle free. Not cotton. plain polyester. rough. not shooting to touch. I bought a "baby blue" one at same time. at least, this one is the same color as advertised on amazon site. disappointed with this product. Paid 420 something for each item, not a bargain. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: j'aimelire

customer_reviews.title: Item was not HC Collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought HC Collection from Ross a few weeks ago and was excited to see this on Amazon. I ordered and was disappointed when I received the product that was NOT HC Collection. It also does not feel as “cool to touch” as the one I bought from Ross. These are pretty thin sheets although smooth. I would have returned them but needed sheets badly for a guest that was staying over. They are just okay for me but would have preferred the actual HC Collection cotton with high thread count.
customer_reviews.author: CeFuego

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to review these until I had them for atleast a couple of weeks. And these are great. They are very comfortable and soft to the touch. I can't attest to the durability at this point (only having used them after a couple of weeks). But they seem of good quality so far. I will consider posting updates if there are any drastic circumstances where normal use has rendered these sheets completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Radke

customer_reviews.title: I have the product and it seems great, cool and pretty thin (which I like) and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a number of reviews talking about deceptive advertising with the HC 1800 series name. In the product description it clearly states a number of times that this is not cotton but a polyester blend, maybe people should read the product description before reading not after getting the product. I have the product and it seems great, cool and pretty thin (which I like) and light as well. For the price of $29.99 it seems a great deal for the six piece set, in fact I just ordered a second set in a dark color. The fit is perfect on the king sized bed and on all four pillows.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these sheets. They are a great value and we really like them in our master bedroom. They're very soft and smooth. I like to be warm at night and my husband likes to stay cool, and these manage to fit the bill for both of us. The picture isn't great, but I wanted to share how well the gray coordinates with a cool neutral color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Heidenthal

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The fitted sheet does not fit my bed properly. My bed is a king; this would fit the bigger king. I would never buy these again. I've washed them 3 times .... The dryer vent is FULL of the material's fibers, lint, whatever it is every time. I've NEVER, ever, had sheets leave so much junk in the dryer vent.
customer_reviews.author: SMV

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable but they do pill
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are really soft and comfortable but I'm disappointed that they have begun to pill after only 3-4 months of use. I purchased in December of 2018 but didn't actually start using them until early February. I thought that they had some sort of warranty against this but I can't find the contact information to investigate further. I've bought other sets for my queen bed and they seem to be ok so far. I'm wondering if I just got a bad set?
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set, but they are disappointing! Loved the first set enough to buy again and in another color. This new set in beige is thinner material, not as soft, and does not stay on the bed. From day one the fit was horrible ... which I think is an elastic problem. They won’t stay put so they end up bunched in the middle of the bed and usually one corner has come off the mattress. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Maryjcm1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, long lasting sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd set of these sheets we've bought and we love them! The first set we bought in 2015 and they're still in great shape. We were just ready for a different color. They're soft and very comfortable. I had read reviews when we bought the first set saying they didn't hold together when they're washed. So I always wash and dry on the gentle cycle. Not sure I even needed to considering the many, many times they've been washed and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Thin and pilling but get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the reviews were so stellar, but I was less than impressed with the quality. For the price though, they were just ok. They’re pretty thin and they don’t stay on our king size bed very well. The corners pull up off the sides and after a couple of washes there’s been some pilling. They get the job done, but def not the quality the reviews make it seem like.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I bought them washed them and put them on. I wasn't sure at first but they are very soft and comfortable. The first week I had them on I started my period in the middle of the night. I was so annoyed and thought the sheets would be ruined like my other pair were. Threw them in the wash and it washed right out. The fitted sheet stays in place really well. I hate wrinkles in my sheets and I may have to adjust it once in the week they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcase opening it's not sewn completely only one side is sewn
customer_reviews.text: I just purchase the sheet set. I washed it before using and they are comfortable yet very disappointed the pillow cases are only sewn on one side and not the other. I was under the impression they were pillow cases and not shams. And even if they're Shams they would not hold a pillow in because they just flop open were the case is not sewn. They are king size pillow cases with king-size pillows that I am using. Wish I would have known that from the start I wouldn't have ordered this set. The pillowcases look sloppy because they just plop open where there is no stitching on the pillow case. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Super soft sheets but some staining like reviews state.
customer_reviews.text: I got the color lavender and it’s spot on. So beautiful! These sheets are super soft but straight out of the package one of the pillow cases had some staining. I’ve read a lot of the reviews and I guess it’s typical. Luckily I only had a pillow case, which most likely I won’t even use, but a lot of people complained about entire sheets having a similar staining.
customer_reviews.author: Kreada L

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sheets for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets for my boys beds after I heard about them from an instagram influencer and I couldn't be happier. They are really soft and thick but not hot. They also are wrinkle resistant...wrinkles drive me nuts. My boys have been using them for awhile now and they still often comment when they climb into bed. I just ordered a third set for my guest bedroom! The quality is amazing for the price. I don't think you could be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: White sheets have a very unpleasant and offensive odor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these sheets after hearing about how soft they are. Sheets are 100% polyester and made in China. The sheets in the ice blue color are very soft and I will keep them. I will be returning the sheets in white. Seller recommends laundering before use. I noticed a weird smell when removing the sheets from plastic packaging. Washed sheets per recommendation and smell did not go away.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: I just received these yesterday and they're wonderful. I'm the kind of person that sleeps hot and I wasn't hot at all last night.Was very comfortable and soft and I liked how it fit perfectly on the mattress And didn't get wrinkly.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Received these very quickly. Upon completion of washing I made the bed and I was extremely pleased with the texture of the fabric, very soft. Almost like a cotton ball. And so few wrinkles, they could be smoothed out with just a swipe of your hand. Very happy with the packaging, enclosed within a plastic jacket. I'm very happy I took advantage of the sale. I bought 3 sets of sheets and I'm very sure the other family members will be just as.happy as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these sheets 3 years ago along with another cheaper advertised set that claimed soft and durable. The cheaper set didn't hold up or last where as these Hotel Luxury 1800 have stood the test of time and hundreds of washings. There has been no pilling and the sheets remain soft. Durable is an understatement. I'm so impressed with the quality that I have bought a second set and a third to keep on rotation. These just may be the last sheets I will ever need to by.
customer_reviews.author: dbactor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets for a new hotel king mattress and was very happy with their softness, comfort, and color. I had only one set of sheets and rather than purchase some locally chose to order another set from this company and was very happy with them as well. I would highly recommend this seller. I am not sure if they are stain resistant as I just started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I bought these sheets that they are microfiber and not cotton and I love that about them. They're very soft and comfortable. I absolutely love the color, sage and may get another set in cream. I can't speak to the stain resistance part but I imagine they're come clean like anything else after washing. If I had one concern, it would be the top sheet is very long, head to toe and slightly short side to side. Other than that my hubby and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Eggplant color does not match + very wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: Ordered king sheet set and duvet cover set in eggplant color. Sheet set color NOT the same as duvet cover set -- which also means that the pillow cases do not match. Right out of the dryer sheets and pillow cases very wrinkled. Bed looks messy. I can take the super thin fabric -- but with a little light behind it you can see thru the sheet. Wanted these as something to use while looking for exactly what we need, but even at the price, it feels like throwing money to the wind.
customer_reviews.author: GaiaMatrix

customer_reviews.title: Best bed linens I’ve ever had...
customer_reviews.text: These bed sheets are simply the best. I couldn’t hardly believe the reasonable price. They are soft, smooth, durable, comfortable, beautiful. In fact, I quickly ordered another set before the price goes up. The linens are comparable to those costing over two hundred dollars a set. You can’t go wrong. I will order from this company when I need a product they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton! Cheap polyester very thin
customer_reviews.text: NOT EGYPTIAN COTTON! CHeap, very thin microfiber made in China. I do NOT like these at all! I did a search for cool percale. COTTON sheets. These popped up and in skimming the details it mentions Egyptian cotton... I wanted cool CRISP percale sheets For summer and instead got stuck with cheap flimsy polyester. Amazon this is very misleading, but I should’ve looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

product_meta.title: Hotel Luxury Bed Sheets Set Today! On Amazon Softest Bedding 1800 Series Platinum Collection-100%!Deep Pocket,Wrinkle & Fade Resistant (Full,Camel)
product_meta.description:
Size:Full| Color:CamelHC Collection
Ultimate blend of craftsmanship and elegance, our linens are designed to offer you a unique and sophisticated sleeping experience. 

1800 Platinum Collection
Light to touch, cool and exceptional strength you can count on, our sheet sets assure you a great night’s sleep. Designed with simple sophistication and ability to retain its vibrancy these brushed microfiber collections are the ultimate for light weight, crisp sleeping comfort. 

Benefits
Microfiber is the new favorite in the world of bed linens! Recent reports show microfiber is the current trend. 19 out of 25 home bed sheets today contain some form of improved fiber or weaving technology. Microfibers are the newest bedding fabric and is distinctive for its unique thinness and strength. These fibers are even thinner than most luxurious natural fibers such as silk. Woven tightly, it guarantees extra strength and durability. This fabric has desirable properties such as stain resistance, breathing ability, wrinkle resistance, luxurious appearance and easy cleaning. Microfiber products are also the best choices for allergy sufferers and can help you rest better. Allergens like dust mites and pollen cannot get in the densely weaved strands. In addition it considered environmentally friendly as opposed to cotton. Cotton takes a lot of water to grow and many pesticides are used to grow cotton that causes serious pollution. With such benefits, it is no wonder microfiber is most people’s favorite when it comes to bedding.

Easy to Care for:
Machine wash in cold with like colors. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
At Bed Linens and More, we guarantee your 100% satisfaction! If within 30 days you are not 100% satisfied return your product for a full refund! NO QUESTIONS ASKED!

Pamper yourself with the softness of Luxury sheets at a fraction of the price!
feature_bullets: PERFECT FIT EVERYTIME GUARANTEED: Deep Pockets fits mattresses to 16'"; with fully elasticized fitted sheet! Full Size 4pc Set - flat sheet (81" x 96"), fitted sheet (54" x 75"), and 2 standard size pillowcases (30" x 20"), Hypo-Allergenic, Repels Dust Mites, Environmentally Friendly!

LUXURY YOU CAN SEE AND FEEL: Create a welcoming environment and a restful feeling in the bedroom with this TOP QUALITY and AFFORDABLE Bedding Collection. You’ll find yourself getting a restful night of sleep on our comfortable bed sheets. Style and comfort don’t have to be mutually exclusive—the two converge beautifully with our large selection of bedding. Color Selections are made to match other HC Collection products: Duvet Covers, Pillowcases & Bed Skirts

TOP QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Our 1800 Platinum Collection Sheet set is made from Double Brushed Microfibers and are softer and more breathable then Egyptian Cotton. Expertly tailored design adds elegance and sophistication to any bedroom. Vibrant Colors made exclusively not to fade with washings! Microfiber fabrics are distinctive for their unique strength and thinness (twice as fine as silk).

DON’T SETTLE FOR CHEAP IMITATION: There may be cheaper alternatives offered online but our Top selling Quality Bedding Products are made with the HIGHEST QUALITY FABRIC so you know it lasts! Made from 100% Double Brushed Microfiber fabric for OPTIMAL SOFTNESS YOU CAN SEE AND FEEL! Wrinkle and Fade Resistant; Hypoallergenic & Resistant to dust mites; EASY TO CARE FOR: Machine Washable, Tumble dry low.

NO RISK PURCHASE 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Just try our products and if you don’t absolutely love them let us know and we will refund your purchase price NO QUESTIONS ASKED! We are so confident you will love our products like our other 5-star reviewers! You will be amazed at the customer service you receive after the sale! You have nothing to lose so ORDER NOW and consider buying an extra set for your loved ones. Makes the perfect gift for any occasion!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars37,460 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Free Lifetime warranty included with purchase. Bed Linens and More is the only authorized SELLER for products being sold on this detail page, purchasing these items from another seller may result in you receiving a fake counterfeit product and will not be covered under our warranty
